If you are an applicant or have been admitted for fall 2023, please visit the Transfer Event website to sign up for a Drop-in Q&A session or a Next Steps to Enrollment workshop. Academic planning and advising will be conducted during Highlander Orientation for Transfer. Legend:AvailableUnavailable / FilledNot ScheduledUniversity of California, Riverside900 University Ave.

Please contact Undergraduate Admissions for the most up-to-date information. Learn about our privacy policy.Campus Security and Fire Safety ReportThe Jeanne Clery Disclosure of Campus Security Policy and Campus Crime Statistics Act (Clery Act) requires UCR (as an institution of higher education receiving federal financial aid) to report specified crime statistics on college campuses and to provide other safety and crime information to all current and prospective students and employees. The Annual Security and Fire Safety Report is available on the Chief Compliance Office website. If you would like a paper copy of the Report, you may contact the Clery Coordinator via email at clery@ucr.edu or by phone at (951) 827-6223.Privacy and AccessibilityTerms and Conditions© 2023 Regents of the University of California×
